All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.component.Component, com.telenav.kivakit.core.function.ResultTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.language.trait.LanguageTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.language.trait.SilentTryTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.language.trait.TryTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Broadcaster, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Listener, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Repeater, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.project.ProjectTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.registry.RegistryTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.vm.JavaTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject, com.telenav.kivakit.resource.PackageTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.settings.SettingsTrait, org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher
public class ZookeeperConnection extends com.telenav.kivakit.component.BaseComponent implements org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher
Maintains a connection to zookeeper and performs operations using that connection

Reading and Writing

  • create(StringPath, byte[], List, CreateMode) - Creates a node at the given path
  • delete(StringPath) - Deletes the node at the given path
  • read(StringPath) - Reads the data from the node at the given path
  • write(StringPath, byte[]) - Writes the given data to the node at the given path
  • children(StringPath) - Returns the names of all children of the node at the given path

Watching for Changes

  • ZookeeperConnection(ZookeeperConnectionListener, ZookeeperChangeListener)
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
See Also:
CreateMode, ACL, ZookeeperChangeListener

    • create

      public com.telenav.kivakit.core.path.StringPath create​(com.telenav.kivakit.core.path.StringPath path, byte[] data, List<org.apache.zookeeper.data.ACL> acl, org.apache.zookeeper.CreateMode mode)
      Recursively creates the given node path using the given ACLs and CreateMode. The final node in the path is then assigned the given data.
      Returns:
      The path that was created, or null if no path could be created

      Parameters:

    • process

      public void process​(org.apache.zookeeper.WatchedEvent event)
      Zookeeper API

      Handle Zookeeper events. If the event is of type None and the state is SyncConnected or Disconnected, the state of the connection is updated, otherwise the appropriate method of ZookeeperChangeListener is called.

      Specified by:
      process in interface org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher

    • read

      public byte[] read​(com.telenav.kivakit.core.path.StringPath path)
      Returns:

      Returns:
      The Zookeeper root path

    • watch

      public void watch​(com.telenav.kivakit.core.path.StringPath path)
      Watches the given path for changes, which will be given to the ZookeeperChangeListener added with #addChangeListener(ZookeeperChangeListener). If the connection is dropped, the watch will be automatically re-established when the connection is established again.

    • watchRoot

      public void watchRoot()
      Starts watching the Zookeeper root

    • watchers

      public Map<com.telenav.kivakit.core.path.StringPath,​org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher> watchers()
      Returns:
      The active watchers for this connection
